title: Straight line motion positive acceleration graph

content.question: Which of the following graphs of position d versus time t corresponds to motion of an object in a straight line with positive acceleration?

choices.label: Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice A is a horizontal line.
Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice B is a line that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and increases linearly.

Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice C is a line that starts on the vertical axis well above the origin and decreases linearly.

Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice D is a curve that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and is increasing and concave up.

Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice E is a curve that starts on the vertical axis well above the origin and is decreasing and concave down.

content.answer: Five answer choices are shown. Each is a graph with d on the vertical axis and t on the horizontal axis. Choice D is a curve that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and is increasing and concave up.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
